title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Skills: Comparing the Effectiveness of Synchronous Remote Tutorials in Pre-Service Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners improve foundational math problem-solving skills by over 80% through a pre-math education curriculum.
Learners successfully complete at least one project each in synchronous remote tutorial and on-campus tutorial environments.
By selecting the optimal tutorial method based on prior knowledge levels (high/medium/low), learners achieve over 90% class participation rates.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
